GK19aghatkvu:2: apūrvaḥ ko 'yaṃ te varada śirasaḥ śekharavidhir nanu jñātaṃ pluṣṭaṃ smaradhanur idaṃ mūrdhani dhṛtam /
GK19aghatkvu:3: yadālokāl loke viṣamaviśikhaḥ sphūrjatitarām iti prokte devyā galitaniyamaḥ śambur avatāt //
GK19aghatkvu:4: idaṃ proṣitapramadayā hetubhūtayā proṣitapramadām uddiśya kathyate kulakam /
GK19aghatkvu:11: proṣitaḥ pramado vallabho harṣaś ca yasyāḥ /
GK19aghatkvu:15: chādite dinakarasya bhāvane khāj jale patati śokabhāvane /
GK19aghatkvu:16: manmathe ca hṛdi hantum udyate proṣitapramadayedam udyate // Ghk_1 //
GK19aghatkvu:17: dinaṃ karotīti dinakaras tasya bhāvane raśmipuñje chādite tiraskṛte sati tāsāṃ tamaḥpratipakṣatayā
GK19aghatkvu:18: suprasiddhānām api sa sūryo yatra ācchādyate tatra kathaṃ harṣāloko 'pi mānaso 'stu,
GK19aghatkvu:19: athaca virahiṇīnāṃ rajanisamayajanitaraṇaraṇakakaluṣitahṛdayāṇāṃ kadācit dinam api vividhavinodālokavitaraṇena bandhutāṃ yāyāt /
GK19aghatkvu:20: adya tu yatprasādāt tādṛśadinam upajāyate tasya api kaścid ātmīyaḥ sahajaḥ svabhāvaḥ,
GK19aghatkvu:21: so 'pi ācchadita iti sātiśayaṃ bhāgyahīnatvaṃ dyotitam /
GK19aghatkvu:25: jalaṃ hi nikaṭavartinā pārthivarajasā ātmānaṃ bhāvayati ekatayā yojayatīti śrutam idam,
GK19aghatkvu:26: adya tu apūrvaṃ vartate śokena virahiṇīr bhāvayati śokamayya eva sampādyante tāḥ /
GK19aghatkvu:27: na hi tāsāṃ prāvṛṭsamayamadhye priyāgamanaśaṅkāmātram api astīti tātkālaṃ nairāśyam eva khāt patatīty anena amuṣya duṣprasahasya apratīkāratayā sātiśayo 'nutāpaḥ sūcyate /
GK19aghatkvu:29: athaca bāhyo yaḥ kaścit hantā tasmād upāyaiḥ palāyyate 'pi,
GK19aghatkvu:30: ayaṃ punar hṛdayāvasthita eva antarhananaṃ prati sasaṃrambhaḥ /
GK19aghatkvu:32: yathā kaścit durjano nirjane nirāloke durdina eva saśokaṃ janam ata eva nirudhyamānam ekākinaṃ prāpyaiva labdhacchidraḥ praharati,
GK19aghatkvu:33: tathāiva amuṣmin kāla īdṛśam iva kāminījanaṃ madanas tāḍayatīty arthaḥ // GhkV_1 //
GK19aghatkvu:34: sarvakālam ativāhya toyadā āgatāḥ stha dayito gato yadā /
GK19aghatkvu:35: nirdayena paradeśasevinā māriṣyatha hi tena māṃ vinā // Ghk_2 //
GK19aghatkvu:38: macchokabhāvakajalavitaraṇodyatā yatra vayaṃ priyaviyuktā na abhūma,
GK19aghatkvu:39: tādṛśaṃ kālam ativāhya yatra kvacit yāpayitvā yadā adya dayito gatas tadā yūyam āgatāḥ /
GK19aghatkvu:40: tathā sarvaṃ kālaṃ diṣṭam athaca kṛtāntarūpaṃ yeṣāṃ te tathā matibāhyā amanojñamanasaḥpīḍakatvāt te ca toyadāś ceti vigrahaḥ /
GK19aghatkvu:44: yena dayitajanavirahitā bhīṣaṇabhavadīyacaritāvalokanaparikhinnahṛdayā jīvitatyāgena api sukham āsīnā /
GK19aghatkvu:45: athaca dayitena vinā yā jīvati sā avaśyavadhārhaiva /
GK19aghatkvu:46: yaś ca dirdayaḥ san paradeśaṃ sevate,
GK19aghatkvu:49: na hi asau jaladharasamaye kim api kāryaṃ kartum samartha iti avaśyam eka eva kvacana ciram āste iti /
GK19aghatkvu:50: tasmād asmāsu upari prema tāvad āstām;
GK19aghatkvu:52: tad avaśyam ihaiva āgamiṣyad ity etāvatī kaṣṭaparampareti anena viśvāsaparipāṭījanitadauḥsthityasūcakena dhvanyate // GhkV_2 //
GK19aghatkvu:53: priyatamaṃ prati nijāvasthāṃ jijñāpayiṣur bhīṣaṇajaladavijṛmbhām asahiṣṇur yuktyā kathaṃcid vacanāt yadi amī deśāntaraṃ vrajeyus tat sarvaṃ sampatsyate /
GK19aghatkvu:54: priyatamo 'pi ca taddeśaprāptajaladharadhvānākarṇanena kadācit madīyām avasthāṃ svayaṃ vā anubhaved api ity abhiprāyeṇa nāyikā idam āha
GK19aghatkvu:55: brūta taṃ pathikapāṃsulaṃ ghanā yūyam eva pathiśīghralaṅgan /
GK19aghatkvu:56: anyadeśaratir adya mucyatāṃ sāthavā tava vadhūḥ kim ucyatām // Ghk_3 //
GK19aghatkvu:60: tam pathikānām madhye pāṃsulaṃ nirmaryādaṃ nirdayaṃ brūta /
GK19aghatkvu:61: etad eva tasya abhijñānaṃ yat pathikeṣu madhye sa eva nirdaya ity arthaḥ /
GK19aghatkvu:62: yato yūyam eva pathaḥ śīghraṃ laṅgayathety anena katham itaḥ kṣipram eva vrajeyur iti protsāhanā dhvanyate /
GK19aghatkvu:64: laṅganaṃ ca ciravrajitasya api jhagiti āsādanam /
GK19aghatkvu:66: sa katham yo mārgaṃ laṅghayitum na śakyas tena adya itaś calitena labhyeteti bhāvaḥ /
GK19aghatkvu:68: anyasmin deśe yā iyaṃ ratir vinā api kāryam āsaktiḥ,
GK19aghatkvu:69: athaca vallabhāntareṇa saha premavisrambho na hi anyathā ambudharakālo 'tivāhya iti,
GK19aghatkvu:71: avaśyaṃ hi tayā ratyā bhavān grathita eveti upālambhagarbhā uktiḥ /
GK19aghatkvu:74: atha kathaṃ prema savisrambhaṃ śithilayituṃ śaktas tarhi sā tava vadhūr na punaḥ priyatamā,
GK19aghatkvu:79: athavā sāthavā tava vadhūr ity etāvat sandeśavacanam abhidhāya kim ahaṃ kathaṃ vā bhaveyam iti kim alīkavikatthaneneti avaśyam eva na jīvāmīty arthaḥ // GhkV_3 //
GK19aghatkvu:80: haṃsapaṅktir api nātha samprati prasthitā viyati mānasaṃ prati /
GK19aghatkvu:81: cātakaś ca tṛṣito 'mbu yācate duḥkhitā pathika sā priyā ca te // Ghk_4 //
GK19aghatkvu:82: yadi punar adya mārge gamanam āgamanaṃ ca na yujyate iti śaṅkyate,
GK19aghatkvu:83: tad evaṃ brūteti nāyikā āha -- he pathika /
GK19aghatkvu:84: na hi bhavān nityaṃ yathā gacchati,
GK19aghatkvu:85: ato yadā taddeśagato 'bhūt tadā sā priyā śrūyate sma /
GK19aghatkvu:89: tvaṃ tu tadīyayāñcāṃ prati na kārakaḥ /
GK19aghatkvu:90: sa hi yāñcāṃ prati kārako bhavati yaḥ kadācit āśāpūraṇaṃ karoti /
GK19aghatkvu:93: ata eva āha na prabhuḥ paryanuyogārhaḥ /
GK19aghatkvu:94: haṃsānāṃ sambandhinī paṅktir atibahavo 'pi haṃsā adya ākāśamārge mānasaṃ prati pracalitāḥ /
GK19aghatkvu:96: tatra avaśyam aparasya api aniruddhena pathā bhāvyaṃ /
GK19aghatkvu:98: yataś ca jaladharamuktajalapaṭale te viyato bhuvi sañcaranti tasya yad ekāyatanam ākāśaṃ tad eva haṃsānāṃ mārgatvena vartate /
GK19aghatkvu:100: yatra ca atidūraṃ mānasaṃ gantuṃ nirbuddhīnām api haṃsānām udyamaḥ,
GK19aghatkvu:101: tatra parimitadeśanivṛttimātra eva na kim iti sā priyā bhavato yācate // GhkV_4 //
GK19aghatkvu:102: nīlaśaṣpam abhibhāti komalaṃ vāri vindati ca cātako 'malam /
GK19aghatkvu:103: ambudaiḥ śikhigaṇo vinādyate kā ratiḥ priya mayā vinādya te // Ghk_5 //
GK19aghatkvu:105: cātako nirmalaṃ jalaṃ vindati jalaṃ labhate,
GK19aghatkvu:106: mayūrakulaṃ ca meghaiḥ kekāyuktaṃ kriyate ity etair vākyair pratyuta iha āgacchatas tava kim api pathi manoharatvam iti dhvanyate /
GK19aghatkvu:109: adya tu tūṣṇīṃ sthitasya mayā vinā kā ratiḥ,
GK19aghatkvu:110: na kācid iti svātmasaubhāgyasaṃbhāvanāgarbhā iyam uktiḥ /
GK19aghatkvu:111: athaca mama īdṛśī avasthā yato vartate,
GK19aghatkvu:112: tato māṃ prati śaṣpaṃ nīlaṃ malinasvabhāvam api komalaṃ karuṇārdram iva bhāti /
GK19aghatkvu:113: cātakaś ca yo nāmnaiva priyagaganajalaḥ prasiddhaḥ,
GK19aghatkvu:116: ambudaiś ca virahihṛdayasphoṭanapaṭutaragarjitair api mamopari karuṇāvaśāt nijasuhṛtkulam ākrandavat sampādyate /
GK19aghatkvu:117: kā punar mayā vinā mama abhāve kā aratiḥ kaḥ khedaḥ, na kaścit /
GK19aghatkvu:118: tathā mama abhāve bhavataḥ kā iyaṃ ratiḥ ko 'yam anubandhaḥ,
GK19aghatkvu:120: athaca prāṅ mayā vinā tava ratir na kadācid abhūt,
GK19aghatkvu:122: adyety anena prāg atyantapremarasamānasatām kapaṭena kila prakaṭitavān asīti dhvanyate /
GK19aghatkvu:123: ata eva sotprāsaṃ priyeti āmantraṇam iti upālambhagarbhā bhaṇitiḥ // GhkV_5 //
GK19aghatkvu:125: toyadāgamakṛśā ca sādya te durdhareṇa madanena sādyate // Ghk_6 //
GK19aghatkvu:126: amī ye bhavatā puraḥ paridṛśyante kalāpinas te meghānāṃ secanapradhānānāṃ sambandhinā śabdena muditāḥ kekāpriyatvāt,
GK19aghatkvu:127: tathā ca proṣitānāṃ kāntānāṃ sambandhini hṛdaye śokaṃ lāpayanti samyak śleṣayanti avaśyaṃ,
GK19aghatkvu:128: tathā proṣitānāṃ hṛdaye śokaṃ lapanti teṣu hi kūjatsu avaśyaṃ virahiṇyaḥ śokavatya iti niścīyate,
GK19aghatkvu:130: sā ca te priyā adya ca tava durdhareṇa kāmena pūrvaṃ hi kāmabhayabhītāyās tvam eva śaraṇam abhūḥ,
GK19aghatkvu:131: adya tu iha sthitasya tava madano durdhara iti durnivāraḥ /
GK19aghatkvu:135: tathā tavaiva sannihitasya sā toyadāgame kṛśā abhūt /
GK19aghatkvu:136: āgamiṣyati jaladharasamayaḥ pravatsyati ca priyatamaḥ iti raṇaraṇakavatī bhavatsannidhāne kṛśā babhūva /
GK19aghatkvu:137: adya tatra madhye bhūyān kālo gata iti asyā adya hitena bhavitavyam iti kavinibaddhadūtīvacanam idam /
GK19aghatkvu:138: na hi meghānāṃ svayam eva “meghaśabdamuditāḥ” iti “toyadāgama-” iti ca svātantryeṇa kathayitum ucitam /
GK19aghatkvu:139: “ambudaiḥ śikhigaṇo vinādyate” ity atre tu prāktanaśloke meghamukhasañcāritākṣarā nāyikā eva kavinā vaktṛtvena upanibaddhā,
GK19aghatkvu:141: kiṃ kṣamāpi tava nāsti kāntayā pāṇḍugaṇḍapatitālakāntayā /
GK19aghatkvu:142: śokasāgarajale ca pātitāṃ tvadguṇasmaraṇam eva pāti tām // Ghk_7 //
GK19aghatkvu:143: sakhyā eva dūtītvena preṣitāyā iyaṃ bhaṇitiḥ /
GK19aghatkvu:147: tat kiṃ tayā hetubhūtayā kṣamā api nāsti /
GK19aghatkvu:148: pānḍuracchāyayoḥ kapolayoḥ patitā alakāntā yasyāḥ tadīyakapolatalapāṇḍimānaṃ malinasvabhāvā alakā api prekṣituṃ na pārayantīty arthaḥ /
GK19aghatkvu:150: tvaṃ yadi tasyā vallabhas tayā īdṛśyā janamātrakṛpābhājanabhūtayā api yā sāmānyajanasya kṛpā bhavati,
GK19aghatkvu:151: sāpi na asti tava ātmani iyatāpi puruṣaguṇaṃ bahumānaṃ vahato 'pi /
GK19aghatkvu:152: tathāpi sā śokārṇavapānīye meghasamayavāriṇā pātitā bhavadīyaguṇasmaraṇena eva rakṣyate /
GK19aghatkvu:153: athaca tvattas tava sakāśāt patitā śoke,
GK19aghatkvu:157: vastutas tu tvadguṇānām eva sātiśayasambhogādīnāṃ smaraṇena eva śoke patitā /
GK19aghatkvu:159: yad uta tena niṣkaruṇena pātitā api tvadguṇasmaraṇena eva rakṣyate /
GK19aghatkvu:160: mama kila sa priyatamo 'pagato nirbahumāno māṃ prati ca dṛḍhatarapremapavitritāntaḥkaraṇo
GK19aghatkvu:161: nūnaṃ mām eva tadavasthāṃ yathā pūrvaṃ trātavaṃs tathā trāsyate iti tvadguṇānāṃ smarantī sā jīvatīti yāvat /
GK19aghatkvu:163: so 'pi avaśyaṃ guṇasmaraṇavṛttyā eva rakṣyate dṛḍhaguṇaviracitarajjvavalambanena jātucid uttareyam apīty arthaḥ // GhkV_7 //
GK19aghatkvu:165: dravati ca kaluṣaṃ jalaṃ nadīnāṃ kim iti ca māṃ samavekṣase na dīnām // Ghk_8 //
GK19aghatkvu:166: iyaṃ vilāpāvasthāṃ yātāyāḥ svayam eva nāyikāyā uktiḥ /
GK19aghatkvu:167: puṣpitāni kuṭajāni yeṣu vaneṣu yāḥ samutsukā utkaṇṭhitā mādṛśyas tāsāṃ yāni ānanāni
GK19aghatkvu:168: priyatamaviyuktāni teṣu tadviṣaye nadīnām api kaluṣaṃ jalaṃ galati asmādṛśīnāṃ virahiṇīnām
GK19aghatkvu:169: ānanāni avalokya jaḍabhāvānām api kaluṣaṃ jalaṃ galati,
GK19aghatkvu:170: asmādṛśīnāṃ virahiṇīsaritāṃ śokāvilaṃ jalaṃ galatīty arthaḥ /
GK19aghatkvu:171: tvaṃ māṃ dīnāṃ kim iti samavekṣase 'pi na /
GK19aghatkvu:175: mārgeṣu meghasalilena vināśiteṣu kāmo dhanuḥ spṛśati tena vinā śiteṣu /
GK19aghatkvu:176: gambhīramegharasitavyathitā kadāhaṃ jahyāṃ sakhi priyaviyogajaśokadāhaṃ // Ghk_9 //
GK19aghatkvu:177: visṛṣṭāyām api dūtyāṃ tadvacanākarṇanād api na āgata iti śokākulamanasi nāyikāyāṃ yadā,
GK19aghatkvu:178: kadācit sakhī tatsamāśvāsanāya ittham abhihitavatī -- mārgāṇāṃ duḥsañcaratvād asau na prāptaḥ,
GK19aghatkvu:179: tadā punar api nāyikāyāḥ sakhiṃ prati iyam uktiḥ -- sakhi /
GK19aghatkvu:180: paśya , mārgā meghasalilena nāśitās tathāparo 'yaṃ doṣaḥ -- apratyayeṣu mārgeṣu śitā iṣavo yatra tādṛk dhanuḥ spṛśati,
GK19aghatkvu:181: śitaṃ śiraṃ sandhāya ākarṇākṛṣṭaṃ moktum icchatīty arthaḥ /
GK19aghatkvu:185: tathāvidheṣu api teṣu duḥsahaṃ smaraśarabhayaṃ smaraś ca tadvarjaṃ śarān sandhatte mām eva tāḍayati,
GK19aghatkvu:186: anyathā kadācit tasyaiva gamanam iha sambhāvyate /
GK19aghatkvu:192: madanaś ca niśitaśarapātanodyata iti avaśyaṃ mama jīvitāntena bhāvyaṃ /
GK19aghatkvu:195: kecit sakhīpriyeti paṭhantaḥ sahṛdayāḥ katham adya api sakhī dūtītvena visṛṣṭā sā
GK19aghatkvu:196: api na āgatā tat nūnaṃ tatsambhogarasalālasayā tayā bhāvyam iti sambhāvayantyāṃ nāyikāyāṃ
GK19aghatkvu:197: kayācit vayasyayā mārgadaurātmye tadāgamanavighnakāriṇi upanyaste svayaṃ nāyikāyā
GK19aghatkvu:199: mārgas tāvat naṣṭāḥ tena ca vinā madanaḥ praharatīti tannikaṭāt calituṃ na yujyate 'syāḥ /
GK19aghatkvu:203: idānīṃ yaḥ priyas tena saha viyogaḥ,
GK19aghatkvu:204: tajjaṃ śokadāhaṃ kadā jīvitāntena api jahyām // GhkV_9 //
GK19aghatkvu:206: madanasya kṛte niketanānāṃ pratibhānty adya vanāni ketanānām // Ghk_10 //
GK19aghatkvu:212: tathā garjatāṃ meghānāṃ pavanena vījitānāṃ prabodhitānām /
GK19aghatkvu:213: ata eva kāmasya kṛte niketanānāṃ saṅketadhāmnām /
GK19aghatkvu:215: jaladhararasitatadvimuktaśīkarāsārasahitaś ca pavanas teṣām eva prabodhanahetutayā sukumāratām āpta iti kim atra jaladasamaye mārgavaiṣamyam,
GK19aghatkvu:216: tat nūnam eva ketanavānāvalokanaprabodhitamadanasthānasukhasaṃskāraḥ priyatama āgamiṣyatīti sambhāvayantyā nāyikāyā bhaṇitiḥ pratibhātīti /
GK19aghatkvu:217: apare tu vanaśabdapaunaruktyam amṛṣyamāṇā madanasya avane rakṣaṇe kṛte ajitānāṃ ketanānāṃ vanāni śobhante iti āhuḥ /
GK19aghatkvu:218: athavā saurabheṇa ye vane ekānte yatra aparaḥ paritrātā na sambhāvyate tatra jitā
GK19aghatkvu:219: apahṛtadhairyavṛttayaḥ kṛtā vimohitāḥ kecana virahijanāḥ teṣāṃ daivavaśāt jaladharaśiśirapavanaprabodhitānām
GK19aghatkvu:220: api punar api etāni ketanavanāni kāmasya kṛte karaṇāya pratibhānti /
GK19aghatkvu:221: madanātaṅkakaraṇād ṛte na eteṣāṃ kim api prayojanam iti yāvat /
GK19aghatkvu:223: yadā svananto garjanto 'mbhodharā yatra saṃjātakṛpāḥ saṃvṛttāḥ,
GK19aghatkvu:224: tatra amīṣāṃ ketanavanānāṃ kā iyaṃ niṣkaruṇatā // GhkV_10 //
GK19aghatkvu:225: tat sādhu yat tvāṃ sutaruṃ sasarja prajāpatiḥ kāmanivāsa sarja /
GK19aghatkvu:226: tvaṃ mañjarībhiḥ pravaro vanānāṃ netrotsavaś cāsi sayauvanānām // Ghk_11 //
GK19aghatkvu:229: prajāpatir yat tvām sasarja śobhanaṃ taruṃ,
GK19aghatkvu:232: kākur iyaṃ evaṃ dhvanati -- prajānāṃ kila patyā avaśyaṃ prajāhitakāriṇā bhavitavyam,
GK19aghatkvu:233: evaṃvidhahṛdayadāhavitaraṇaniḥśeṣitanikhilajantoḥ kāmasya nivāsabhūtaṃ bhavantaṃ nirmimāṇena prajāpatinā suṣṭhu prajāpatitvam uddarśitaṃ,
GK19aghatkvu:234: tvayi dṛṣṭamātra eva mama kāpi vyathā vijṛmbhate ity arthaḥ /
GK19aghatkvu:235: atha evaṃ api jānatī kim iti mām avalokitavaty asīti yadi,
GK19aghatkvu:236: tat kila mañjarībhir bhavān sakalavanamadhye śreṣṭho bahvībhiḥ kantābhis tu parivṛta iti śṛṅgāriṇi bhavati bahumāna ity arthaḥ,
GK19aghatkvu:238: yadā kila ahaṃ yuvatiḥ priyasaṃyuktā tvām avalokitavatī,
GK19aghatkvu:240: adya tvam evaṃvidhabahutaravallabhāparivṛto bhūtvā kathaṃ māṃ priyaviyuktāṃ trātavyāṃ darśanamātreṇa api madanaparavaśāṃ karoṣīti vākyārthaḥ
GK19aghatkvu:241: navakadamba śiro 'vanatāsmi te vasati vo madanaḥ kusumasmite /
GK19aghatkvu:242: kuṭaja kiṃ kusumair avahasyate praṇipatāmi ca duṣprahasya te // Ghk_12 //
GK19aghatkvu:243: yadā sarjataror apakrāntā nāyikā jhagiti kadambam avalokayati,
GK19aghatkvu:244: tadā prāktanamadanabhayabhītimatī jhagiti āha -- he navakadamba /
GK19aghatkvu:245: idānīm eva avalokitānubhūtatvadīyapratāpā ahaṃ tubhyaṃ śirasā avanatā asmi /
GK19aghatkvu:247: tāvat tadīyakusumavilokanajanitaraṇaraṇakā āha -- yuṣmākaṃ puṣpavikāse kāmo vasati,
GK19aghatkvu:248: mayā jñātaṃ sarjasyaiva idaṃ vaiṣamyaṃ yāvatā tvam api evam eva,
GK19aghatkvu:249: sarveṣām ekayogakṣamateti sarvathā mama hātāśāyā nayanaviṣayatākṣamaṃ na kiñcit samastīti va iti bahuvacanena dhvanyate /
GK19aghatkvu:250: itthamākārayatnī eva nāyikā yadā kusumitaṃ jhagiti kuṭajam avalokayati,
GK19aghatkvu:251: tadā manyate nūnaṃ mām ayaṃ sarvato hi hatabhāgadheyām apahasatīti tata āha -- he kuṭaja /
GK19aghatkvu:254: yaś ca sannihita eva param apahasati,
GK19aghatkvu:257: te duḥsahasya praṇāma eva śobhana iti kākuḥ /
GK19aghatkvu:259: kiṃkusumair iti kutsitaiḥ parātaṅkavitaraṇacaturaiḥ puṣpair avahasyate iti sotprāsaṃ kākvā dhvanito 'rthaḥ // GhkV_12 //
GK19aghatkvu:260: taruvara vinatāsmi te sadāhaṃ hṛdayaṃ me prakaroṣi kiṃ sadāham /
GK19aghatkvu:261: tava puṣpanirīkṣitāpadehaṃ visṛjeyaṃ sahasaiva nīpa deham // Ghk_13 //
GK19aghatkvu:264: tat kim adya mama hṛdayaṃ dāhayuktaṃ prakarṣeṇa karoṣi /
GK19aghatkvu:265: anye 'pi taravo na evaṃ māṃ dahanti yathā tvaṃ sarvakālam abhiṣṭuto 'pi,
GK19aghatkvu:267: athaca tava sadā ahaṃ praṇatā yena īdṛśaḥ upakāras tvat sambhāvyate,
GK19aghatkvu:272: tāni tu yadi mahāpuruṣatayā evaṃvidhām avasthāṃ prāptāṃ mām avalokeyuḥ,
GK19aghatkvu:275: na ca evaṃ sambhāvanīyam -- ahito hṛdayadāhakāri kathaṃ praṇamyate iti yataḥ kiṃ tvaṃ hṛdayaṃ sadāhaṃ karoṣi,
GK19aghatkvu:277: nijena eva virahahutavahena mama dahyate hṛdayaṃ,
GK19aghatkvu:278: tad idānīṃ dāhakena api dagdhasya kiṃ dahyate iti sambandhaḥ /
GK19aghatkvu:279: yadi tu ahaṃśabdapaunaruktyaṃ sahṛdayāḥ kṣamante tadā evaṃ vyākhyā -- āpade viṣamavipadvahanārtham eva kevalaṃ yo mama dehas taṃ tyajeyam iti
GK19aghatkvu:280: tathā nīpa taruvara tava natā asmi /
GK19aghatkvu:281: evam uktvā duḥsahatayā dvitīyavākyam āha -- dāhayuktaṃ mama hṛdayaṃ prakaroṣi,
GK19aghatkvu:284: tathā sarvakālaṃ tvatpuṣpekṣitā aham akāṇḍa eva dehaṃ tyajeyaṃ,
GK19aghatkvu:287: madhunaḥ samavekṣya kālatāṃ bhramaraś cumbati yūthikālatām // Ghk_14 //
GK19aghatkvu:289: madīyapriyatamas tu pathika ekatra eva kvacit sthito mama nāma api na avekṣate iti /
GK19aghatkvu:292: tato 'nantaraṃ tu ghanair muktās tyaktā ye 'mbulavās taiḥ karaṇabhūtaiḥ prahāsitaiḥ kusumair upalakṣitām /
GK19aghatkvu:293: athaca ghanā muktāphalasadṛśā ye jalakaṇāḥ tatkṛtāni yāni prahāsitāni prahāsitatvotpāditāni nijacchāyāsphuraṇāni yaiḥ pītāni api santi śuklāni jātāni kusumāni /
GK19aghatkvu:294: kiṃ kṛtvā madhuno makarandasya kālatām atyantaparipākarasotpannāṃ vilokya /
GK19aghatkvu:295: athaca yo nāyakaś cirāt kāntām upabhuṅkte,
GK19aghatkvu:296: so 'pi madhunaḥ pānagoṣṭhyāḥ kālatām avasaraprāptim avalokya paricumbati /
GK19aghatkvu:298: tathā sā api kāntā dhammillapuṣpair ghanair muktāphalair virahasmaraṇānandādikotpannaiś
GK19aghatkvu:299: ca ambulavair bāṣpair harṣacāṭvādijaiḥ prahasitaiḥ sitair baddhair vyāmiśrarūpatayā
GK19aghatkvu:300: sthitaiḥ parasparasaṃśliṣṭair upalakṣitā bhavati kilakiñcitaceṣṭālaṅkārayoginī bhavati
GK19aghatkvu:304: ityādi / ata īdṛśī kadā ahaṃ priyeṇa paricumbyamānā bhuyāsam ity arthaḥ // GhkV_14 //
GK19aghatkvu:306: salilair vihataṃ rajaḥ kṣitau ravicandrāv api nopalakṣitau // Ghk_15 //
GK19aghatkvu:309: mārgavaiṣamyād eva asāv iyantaṃ kālaṃ na āgataḥ /
GK19aghatkvu:310: tathāhi nīradair meghair upetya sarvatodikkaṃ saṅghaṭya khaṃ gaganaṃ nicitam /
GK19aghatkvu:311: kīdṛśaiḥ priyaiḥ priyābhiś ca ye vihīnā viyuktās teṣāṃ hṛdayāvanīṃ manobhūmīṃ radanti vilikhanti /
GK19aghatkvu:312: evaṃ tāvat sarvatodikkaṃ duṣprekṣaṃ kṣitau bhūmau rajaḥ salilair vihatam /
GK19aghatkvu:313: āstāṃ tāvad anyat salilena abhibhūyate rajomātram api na avaśiṣṭam ity arthaḥ // GhkV_15 //
GK19aghatkvu:314: haṃsā nadanmeghabhayād dravanti niśāmukhāny adya na candravanti /
GK19aghatkvu:315: navāmbumattāḥ śikhino nadanti meghāgame kundasamānadanti // Ghk_16 //
GK19aghatkvu:318: pratidūtyāś caiva nāyikāṃ prati uktiḥ -- evaṃ nāma meghāḥ śabdāyante yat haṃsā api palāyante,
GK19aghatkvu:319: rātrāv api na sañcaraṇaṃ yujyate yataś candrayuktāni tanmukhāni na bhavanti,
GK19aghatkvu:320: ete ca śikhino mayūrā udgatapraharṣavaśāt śabdāyante /
GK19aghatkvu:321: etena tat pratyuktaṃ yat tu nāyikayā pūrvam uktaṃ
GK19aghatkvu:324: tad eva hi pratyuta raṇaraṇakapradīpakaṃ mārgasaṅkaṭatāṃ karotīty arthaḥ // GhkV_16 //
GK19aghatkvu:325: meghāvṛttaṃ niśi na bhāti nabho vitāraṃ nidrābhyupaiti ca hariṃ śubhasevitāram /
GK19aghatkvu:326: sendrayudhaś ca jalado 'dya rasann ibhānāṃ saṃrambham āvahati bhūdharasannibhānām // Ghk_17 //
GK19aghatkvu:328: yato rātrisamaye vitāraṇ vigatatārāpaṭalaṃ nabho na bhāti yato meghāvṛttam /
GK19aghatkvu:329: yac ca tayā uktaṃ “pathikapāmsulo 'sau mām upekṣate” iti,
GK19aghatkvu:331: śubhasevitāram akaluṣacaritam api bhagavantaṃ hariṃ nidrā abhyupaiti aśaknuvatī virahaṃ soḍhum nāyakam abhisarati pratyutety arthaḥ /
GK19aghatkvu:332: indrāyudhayuktajalado rasan śabdāyamāna ibhānāṃ kariṇāṃ parvatasadṛśānāṃ saṃrambhaṃ saṃrabdhatām āvahati samantāt darśayati /
GK19aghatkvu:334: so 'pi anyānullaṅghanīyena śakrāyudhena vajreṇa sātiśayabhīṣaṇaḥ sādinā hatānāṃ kariṇāṃ sādṛśyam udvahatīty arthaḥ /
GK19aghatkvu:335: athavā meghaḥ śabdāyamāna ibhānāṃ kariṇāṃ parvatasadṛśānāṃ saṃrambhaṃ janayati pratigarjanaśaṅkayeti te 'pi kṣubhitāḥ sampannā iti sarvathā susaṅkaṭāḥ panthānaḥ // GhkV_17 //
GK19aghatkvu:337: paridhīraravaṃ jalaṃ darīṣu prapaty adbhutarūpasundarīṣu // Ghk_18 //
GK19aghatkvu:338: pratidūtyā eva iyam uktir nāyikā yadā evam āha nanu aham eva tatra yāsyāmīti,
GK19aghatkvu:340: darīṣu guhāsu api antaḥsthitā yā adbhutarūpasundaryās tāsu api upari jalaṃ patatīti vyadhikaraṇasaptamyau /
GK19aghatkvu:348: aparasya ye trāsadāyinas te 'pi yato jaladhararasitāt trasyanti,
GK19aghatkvu:349: tatra kā vārtā bhavādṛśīnāṃ mālatīkusumasukumāramanasām iti tātparyārthaḥ /
GK19aghatkvu:351: darīṣu antaḥ paritaḥ samantāt dhīro gambhīro ravo yasya,
GK19aghatkvu:352: kandarāsu antaḥ pratiśabdena dviguṇībhūta ity arthaḥ /
GK19aghatkvu:353: tena eṣā api āśā na asti -- toyadajalapaṭalaṃ gaganāt nipatat kvacana guhāmukhe 'tivāhya punar api gamiṣyāma iti // GhkV_18 //
GK19aghatkvu:354: kṣipraṃ prasādayati samprati ko 'pi tāni kāntāmukhāni rativigrahakopitāni /
GK19aghatkvu:355: utkaṇṭhayanti pathikāṇ jaladāḥ svanantaḥ śoko vivardhati ca tadvinatāsv anantaḥ // Ghk_19 //
GK19aghatkvu:356: evam etābhir uktibhiḥ priyatamāgamanaṃ durghaṭam iti avagate āsthābandho nāyikāyā
GK19aghatkvu:357: vijāghaṭītīty abhiprayeṇa sā eva punar āśvāsasampādanāya asya mādhyasthye viśeṣānuddeśāt
GK19aghatkvu:359: samprati jaladasamaye tāni kāntāmukhāni niratiśayasaundaryavanti rativigraheṇa praṇayakupitena
GK19aghatkvu:360: sañjātaroṣāṇi tathā yāni tadīyaviyogajanitapāṇḍimnā adya āsādhāraṇadharmasundarāṇi
GK19aghatkvu:361: kṣipram anāyāsena eva prasādayati tvām avaśyaṃ prasādayatīti yāvat /
GK19aghatkvu:362: nanu na adyāpi asāv āgatas tat katham etat /
GK19aghatkvu:363: āha śabdāyamānā hi jaladharāḥ pathikān raṇaraṇakavataḥ kurvanti niścitaṃ dinād dinam upacīyamānajaladharadhvānākarṇanena parivardhitotkaṇṭhaḥ priyatamas tāvad āgacchatīti yāvat /
GK19aghatkvu:365: āha tadvanitāsu pathikadayitāsu tathā śoko vivardhati vivṛddhavad ācarati yathā anantaḥ sampadyate /
GK19aghatkvu:366: cakāreṇa evaṃ dhvanyate tad eva rasitaṃ tāsāṃ śokavivṛddhau kāraṇam iti // GhkV_19 //
GK19aghatkvu:368: tāsām ṛtuḥ saphala eva hi yā dineṣu sendrāyudhāmbudharagarjitadurdineṣu /
GK19aghatkvu:369: ratyutsavaṃ priyatamaiḥ saha mānayanti meghāgamaṃ priyasakhi śvasamānayanti // Ghk_20 //
GK19aghatkvu:371: pustakeṣu kena kāraṇena gata iti na vidmaḥ /
GK19aghatkvu:372: tathāhi pūrvaślokaucityaṃ tāvad arthena na bhajate /
GK19aghatkvu:373: tāsām eva saphala ṛtur varṣākhyo yāti yā sendrāyudhair ambudair durdineṣu priyatamaiḥ saha ratyutsavaṃ mānayanti /
GK19aghatkvu:375: meghāgamaṃ śvasamāḥ sārameyaprāyā api nayanti -- iti vyākhyāyāṃ prāktane nave (?)
GK19aghatkvu:378: yān astaṃ gacchann ino mārtaṇḍo yeṣu dineṣu -- ity api vyākhyāne tāsām iti apekṣito yadartho durupapādaḥ /
GK19aghatkvu:379: tāsām iti tu anapekṣitayadarthe padavyaṅgye dhvanau vyākhyāyamāne uttaravākyaṃ khaṇḍaṃ gacchet caramārdhe cānyatheti (?)
GK19aghatkvu:380: madhye śāstranyāyopacitaḥ kāvyāmṛtakāluṣaikakāraṇam adhyāhāraḥ kalpyaḥ śvasamā meghāgamaṃ nayantīti param anaucityam /
GK19aghatkvu:381: na ca evaṃvidhena anaucityena kulakaparisamāptiḥ kriyamāṇā sahṛdayacetaḥsu romanthād ṛte kiñcit vidadhyāt /
GK19aghatkvu:382: śvasatīti śvasas tadvad ācaratīti kvip tato 'pi tācchīlyādivivakṣāyāṃ cānaś /
GK19aghatkvu:383: tataḥ priyasakhiśabdena sambandhaḥ prāg eva vā /
GK19aghatkvu:387: priyasakhiṣv iti saptamyā samāsa iti bahuvacanānte 'pi na kaścit kṛtaḥ sambandhaḥ /
GK19aghatkvu:389: kiñca atra kartā mahākaviḥ kālidāsa iti anuśrutam asmābhiḥ /
GK19aghatkvu:390: na ca asya kāvye tṛṇamātram api kalaṅkapātram utprekṣitavanto manorathe';
GK19aghatkvu:393: sa ca sakhyā pratidūtībhūtayā nāyikāyā āsthābandhadārḍhyotpādanāya yujyate /
GK19aghatkvu:394: utpannasamāśvāsā hi hṛdayaṃ sthāpayantī vipralambhayituṃ śakyā syāt
GK19aghatkvu:397: iti dṛṣṭyā / tena asya parisamāptidhurodvahasya api durandharatvam avikalam eveti /
GK19aghatkvu:398: tad idaṃ yuktam ayuktaṃ veti svayam eva vidāṃ kuruta sahṛdayāḥ // GhkV_20 //
GK19aghatkvu:399: bhāvānuraktalalanāsurataiḥ śapeyam ālabhya cāmbu tṛṣitaḥ karakośapeyam /
GK19aghatkvu:400: jīyeya yena kavinā yamakaiḥ pareṇa tasmai vaheyam udakaṃ ghaṭakarpareṇa // Ghk_21 //
GK19aghatkvu:401: kavinā auddhatyaprakaṭanāya sahṛdayajanamānasarañjanāya pratijñā iyam upanibadhyate /
GK19aghatkvu:402: sañjātapipāsaḥ karakośena hastasampuṭena peyaṃ pānārhaṃ tāvad avasaraprāptam api
GK19aghatkvu:403: jalam atyantābhilāṣautsukyapātram adrohayogyam api pratyuta ālabhya drugdhvā sahajapremapraṇayinīsambhogarasaiś ca śapeyam /
GK19aghatkvu:404: atra śarīrasparśanākhyasya upālambhasya na atīva spaṣṭateti “śapa upalāmbhane” (Vā-911)
GK19aghatkvu:409: atra ca yamakānāṃ vipralambhaśṛṅgārarasātiśayavighnabhūtānām api mayā tathā apṛthagyatnanirvartyatayā nibandhaḥ kṛtaḥ,
GK19aghatkvu:410: yena pratyuta rasaparipoṣakaviśiṣṭavyākhyābhidhāyipadaparamparālābho yamakaiḥ sampannaḥ / tad uktaṃ
GK19aghatkvu:413: iti / etayā ca pratijñayā etat parihṛtaṃ
GK19aghatkvu:418: atra ca pratyuta ātmaparipoṣakatvam eva uktena prakāreṇa yamakānām iti /
GK19aghatkvu:420: sā eva lokottarā vyutpattir iti abhidhīyate;
GK19aghatkvu:421: na tu anyā kaviśakter vyutpattir nāma kācit /
GK19aghatkvu:422: yad uktaṃ mayā eva raurave vicāre
GK19aghatkvu:423: “na vai doṣā doṣā na ca khalu guṇā eva ca guṇā
GK19aghatkvu:425: iyaṃ sā vaidagdhī prakṛtimadhurā tasya sukaver
